# uptimekuma_notification_goalert (Resource)

GoAlert notification resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "uptimekuma_notification_goalert" "example" {
  name      = "Example GoAlert Notification"
  is_active = true
  base_url  = "https://goalert.example.com"
  token     = "your-integration-token"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `base_url` (String) GoAlert base URL
- `name` (String) Notification name
- `token` (String, Sensitive) GoAlert integration token

### Optional

- `apply_existing` (Boolean)
- `is_active` (Boolean)
- `is_default` (Boolean)

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Notification identifier
